description: This file defines the application's routing logic using Flutter's Router API. It includes classes for parsing route information, managing navigation state, and building pages based on current paths, with authentication guards for protected routes.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: Provides static configuration for the application's router, establishing route information parser and delegate.

classes.name: _SimpleRouteParser
classes.description: Parses URL paths into route strings and restores route information based on these paths.

classes.name: _SimpleRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages navigation state, handles route changes, guards protected routes with authentication, and builds the appropriate page widget based on the current route.

methods.name: setNewPath
methods.description: Updates the current route path and notifies listeners to rebuild navigation stack.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Sets a new route configuration, calling setNewPath internally.

methods.name: _guardPath
methods.description: Checks if a route requires authentication and redirects to login if the user is not authenticated.

methods.name: _buildBody
methods.description: Returns the widget corresponding to the current route path.
